input.sentences: i went on vacation last week .
there were a ton of old ruins that i saw .
some of them were over 1000 years old .
the weather was very good while i was on vacation .
i took a ton of pictures while i was there .
output.sentences: My husband and I finagled to get the same week off to take our vacation together this year.
We both have a ton of passion for history, so we knew our vacation needed to include ruins we could peruse together.
We found a 1000 plus places online and finally narrowed it down to a town, noted for great weather and beautiful landscapes, as well as compellng historic ruins.
The weather and the vacation all lived up to the hype online, and we had a great time.
We snapped no less than a ton of pictures, that we fully intend to bore all our friends with.
